symbols.name: sap.ui.demokit
symbols.description: SAPUI5 library with non-public controls, used in the UI5 demokit (SDK)
symbols.title: namespace sap.ui.demokit

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer
nodes.description: A container for both the source and the runtime results of a CodeSample.

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.CodeViewer
nodes.description: Shows a piece of (Javascript) code and allows to edit it

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.FileUploadIntrospector
nodes.description: Control that allows to monitor uploaded files in a demo scenario.

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.HexagonButton
nodes.description: A custom button with a 'hexagon' shape

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.HexagonButtonGroup
nodes.description: A group of HexagonButtons, aligned in a packed grid

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.IndexLayout
nodes.description: Layout which renders content items with equal width and height.

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.TagCloud
nodes.description: A simple TagCloud representing a set of weighted tags

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.UI5EntityCueCard
nodes.description: Displays documentation for a UI5 entity (control or type).

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.UI5EntityCueCardStyle
nodes.description: Different styles for an entity cue card.

nodes.name: sap.ui.demokit.UIAreaSubstitute
nodes.description: A substitute for a UIArea that can be embedded in the control tree.

symbols.name: sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer
symbols.description:
A container for both the source and the runtime results of a CodeSample. By default, only the runtime results are shown. There are additional controls that allow the user to display the source, modify and run it.

The container provides a sub container that can be used in calls to sap.ui.setRoot() as if it would be a normal UIArea. So the sample code doesn't have to know that it runs in a CodeSample container.

properties.name: scriptElementId
properties.description: Id of the script element that contains the initial sample code for this code sample.

properties.name: sourceVisible
properties.description: Whether the source code is visible or not.

properties.name: title
properties.description: A title to be displayed above the code.

properties.name: uiAreaId
properties.description: Id of the container for the running code. This Id can be used in calls to sap.ui.setRoot as if it would be a normal UIArea. Internally, a container UIElement is created with that Id.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the CodeSample container.

aggregations.name: _uiarea
aggregations.description: The UIAreaSubstitute used by this code sample container

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new CodeSampleContainer.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: apply

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: the current code that will be applied

events.description: Fired when the user decides to apply his/her changes to the sample code

methods.name: attachApply

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the apply event of this sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer.

When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer itself.

Fired when the user decides to apply his/her changes to the sample code

methods.name: detachApply

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description:
Detaches event handler fnFunction from the apply event of this sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer.

The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

methods.name: sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer.extend

returnValue.description: Created class / constructor function

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Control.extend.

methods.name: fireApply

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: mParameters
parameters.description: Parameters to pass along with the event

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: the current code that will be applied

methods.description: Fires event apply to attached listeners.

methods.name: sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer.getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.demokit.CodeSampleContainer.

methods.name: getScriptElementId

returnValue.description: Value of property scriptElementId

methods.description:
Gets current value of property scriptElementId.

Id of the script element that contains the initial sample code for this code sample.

methods.name: getSourceVisible

returnValue.description: Value of property sourceVisible

methods.description:
Gets current value of property sourceVisible.

Whether the source code is visible or not.

Default value is false.

methods.name: getTitle

returnValue.description: Value of property title

methods.description:
Gets current value of property title.

A title to be displayed above the code.

methods.name: getUiAreaId

returnValue.description: Value of property uiAreaId

methods.description:
Gets current value of property uiAreaId.

Id of the container for the running code. This Id can be used in calls to sap.ui.setRoot as if it would be a normal UIArea. Internally, a container UIElement is created with that Id.

methods.name: getWidth

returnValue.description: Value of property width

methods.description:
Gets current value of property width.

Width of the CodeSample container.

Default value is 90%.

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.description: New value for property scriptElementId

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property scriptElementId.

Id of the script element that contains the initial sample code for this code sample.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

parameters.description: New value for property sourceVisible

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property sourceVisible.

Whether the source code is visible or not.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is false.

A title to be displayed above the code.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setUiAreaId

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sUiAreaId
parameters.description: New value for property uiAreaId

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property uiAreaId.

Id of the container for the running code. This Id can be used in calls to sap.ui.setRoot as if it would be a normal UIArea. Internally, a container UIElement is created with that Id.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setWidth

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: sWidth
parameters.description: New value for property width

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property width.

Width of the CodeSample container.

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is 90%.

properties.description: Whether the code can be edited or not

parameters.name: sId

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new CodeViewer.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: press
events.description: Called when the mouse button is clicked over the non-editable(!) control

events.name: save
events.description: Called when the editor is active and should be saved

methods.name: attachPress

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.demokit.CodeViewer itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the press event of this sap.ui.demokit.CodeViewer.

When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.demokit.CodeViewer itself.

Called when the mouse button is clicked over the non-editable(!) control

symbols.name: sap.ui.demokit.FileUploadIntrospector
symbols.description: Control that allows to monitor uploaded files in a demo scenario. This is not a general purpose monitor but only works with the demo fileupload service.

properties.name: autoRefreshInterval
properties.description: Interval in milliseconds after which the content is checked again. values lower or equal to 0 mean 'no automatic refresh'.

properties.name: height
properties.description: (CSS) Height of the control

properties.name: uploadUrl
properties.description: The URL to check the upload content with....

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the file list

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new FileUploadIntrospector.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

returnValue.description: Created class / constructor function

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.demokit.FileUploadIntrospector with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Control.extend.

methods.name: getAutoRefreshInterval

returnValue.description: Value of property autoRefreshInterval

methods.description:
Gets current value of property autoRefreshInterval.

Interval in milliseconds after which the content is checked again. values lower or equal to 0 mean 'no automatic refresh'.

Default value is 0.

methods.name: getHeight

returnValue.description: Value of property height

methods.description:
Gets current value of property height.

(CSS) Height of the control

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.demokit.FileUploadIntrospector.

returnValue.description: Value of property uploadUrl

methods.description:
Gets current value of property uploadUrl.

The URL to check the upload content with....

returnValue.description: Value of property width

methods.description:
Gets current value of property width.

Width of the file list

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is 0.

symbols.name: sap.ui.demokit.HexagonButtonGroup
symbols.description: A group of HexagonButtons, aligned in a packed grid

properties.name: colspan
properties.description: How many buttons might be placed in the same row of the grid

aggregations.name: buttons
aggregations.description: The buttons to layout in a grid

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new HexagonButtonGroup.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: addButton

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oButton
parameters.description: The button to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

methods.description: Adds some button to the aggregation buttons.

methods.name: destroyButtons

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description: Destroys all the buttons in the aggregation buttons.

methods.name: sap.ui.demokit.HexagonButtonGroup.extend

Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.demokit.HexagonButtonGroup with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Control.extend.

methods.name: getButtons
methods.description:
Gets content of aggregation buttons.

The buttons to layout in a grid

methods.name: getColspan

returnValue.description: Value of property colspan

methods.description:
Gets current value of property colspan.

How many buttons might be placed in the same row of the grid

Default value is 3.

methods.name: sap.ui.demokit.HexagonButtonGroup.getMetadata

returnValue.description: Metadata object describing this class

methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.demokit.HexagonButtonGroup.

methods.name: indexOfButton

returnValue.description: The index of the provided control in the aggregation if found, or -1 otherwise

parameters.name: oButton
parameters.description: The button whose index is looked for

symbols.name: sap.ui.demokit.UI5EntityCueCard
symbols.description:
Displays documentation for a UI5 entity (control or type).

The documentation will be read from a UI5 metamodel file that by default is loaded from the same resource location where the control or type would be loaded from (using the UI5 resource loading). This control displays all properties, aggregations, associations, events and methods that are described in the metamodel. For each part, it lists the name, type (where applicable) and documentation. If the navigable property is set to true, all types are shown as links and when pressed, the navigate event is fired. This allows consumers to react on a user click on such a type (and to e.g. navigate to the underlying type of a property or aggregation)

properties.name: collapsible
properties.description: Whether the cue card can be collapsed at all. When set to true, the value of property expanded determines the current collapsed/expanded state. When false, the control is always expanded.

properties.name: entityName
properties.description: Qualified name of the control or type to show the documentation for. The name can be specified in the metamodel notation ('sap.ui.core/Control' or in the UI5 resource notation (sap.ui.core.Control).

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: Whether the cue card is currently expanded.

properties.name: navigable
properties.description: Whether type information is navigable. Also see event 'navigate'.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Style of the cue card.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: id for the new control, generated automatically if no id is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: initial settings for the new control

constructor.description:
Constructor for a new UI5EntityCueCard.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

events.name: navigate

parameters.name: entityName
parameters.description: Name of the entity (control or type) that has been clicked.

events.description:
Fired when a link for a type is activated (clicked) by the user.

When property "navigable" is set to true, type links are created for the types of properties, aggregations and associations, for the types of event or method parameters and for the return types of methods (if not void).

The default behavior for this event is to set the entityName property to the clicked entityName. Applications can prevent the default by calling the corresponding method on the event object.

methods.name: attachNavigate

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: oData
parameters.description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.ui.demokit.UI5EntityCueCard itself

methods.description:
Attaches event handler fnFunction to the navigate event of this sap.ui.demokit.UI5EntityCueCard.

When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.ui.demokit.UI5EntityCueCard itself.

Fired when a link for a type is activated (clicked) by the user.

When property "navigable" is set to true, type links are created for the types of properties, aggregations and associations, for the types of event or method parameters and for the return types of methods (if not void).

The default behavior for this event is to set the entityName property to the clicked entityName. Applications can prevent the default by calling the corresponding method on the event object.

methods.name: detachNavigate

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

parameters.name: fnFunction
parameters.description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.name: oListener
parameters.description: Context object on which the given function had to be called

methods.description:
Detaches event handler fnFunction from the navigate event of this sap.ui.demokit.UI5EntityCueCard.

The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
